strings.helpDesktop: Arrow keys to move your character!
strings.helpMobile: Tap and swipe in the direction you want to walk!
strings.helpPush: Push boxes to clear a path or activate switches
strings.helpStand: You can stand on switches to activate them too!
strings.helpSnakes: Don't get too close to any of these!
strings.helpRestart: Restart a level if you ever get stuck!
strings.restartConfirm: Are you sure you want to restart the level?
strings.levelIntro1: Just walk to the glowing yellow tile!
strings.levelIntro2: Some objects can be pushed... Some can be collected!
strings.levelIntro3: Switches are activated when something is placed on top of them!
strings.levelIntro4: Light cracks might be safe to walk on, but deeper cracks are not!
strings.levelIntro5: Pay attention to which objects you move, in which order!
strings.levelIntro6: Cracks in the floor prevent you from doubling back on yourself.
strings.levelIntro7: Watch out for those springy hands!
strings.levelIntro8: Can you collect the umbrella AND make it to the exit?
strings.levelIntro9: Sandy's trapped... Can you find her?
strings.levelIntro10: Watch out... Don't get zpped by the jellies!
strings.levelIntro13: The pirate ship is full of spikey swords and more, Good luck!
strings.levelIntro14: This looks tricky... Watch out for those spikes!
strings.levelIntro15: The final challenge... Rescue the Dutchman, and let's get out of here!
strings.levelEndScreen: Play that level again, or continue to the next challenge?
strings.hint1: Just get to the yellow glowing tile to exit the level!
strings.hint2: Cardboard boxes can be pushed around!
strings.hint3: Push boxes on switches to keep them activated!
strings.hint4: Don't step into holes, or dark cracks in the floor!
strings.hint5: You can step on light cracks only once, making them a one way route!
strings.hint6: You need to keep both anchors raised in order to get to Squidward and then reach the exit!
strings.hint8: Try pushing those boxes in different ways!
strings.hint10: Watch out - jellies about! They'll zap you if you touch them.
strings.hint11: Look for a safe way to position both boxes on the swiwtches.
strings.hint12: You're getting the hang of it now, just stay away from those jellies!
strings.hint13: Those spikes on the floor might look like a short cut... but they aren't!
strings.hint14: It looks more difficult than it really is, just don't double back on yourself!
strings.hint15: Oh come on it's the final challenge, you got this far, you don't need any more help!!
strings.sure: ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO QUIT?
strings.achieve3: Make your way to Sandy's Treehouse
strings.achieve4: Meet your friends at the beach
strings.achieveAlert3: You made your way to Sandy's Treehouse!
strings.achieveAlert4: You met your friends at the beach!
